entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local amount 2 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
